subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A new hack?
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hallo Frank,

> My family (the Binders) are from around Freising, Bayern (around
> Munich).

Intresting; that's where I currently live, too (a few km east of Munich).

> I haven't been posting much lately, been working too much. I work with
> lasers and light mostly as a transmission source. I think you are on
> to something with using parts of speech for a sound source. I got
> distracted for a little while playing with these hacks and boxes as
> they like to call them. They are effective but limited in my use of
> them.

Yes, there's yet a lot to research and to improve. What are you doing
with lasers/light?

Stefan
